All Implemented Interfaces:

public class MicroserviceGrpcService extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Initializable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable, com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.MicroservletMountTarget
GRPC protocol service that simply copies mounted request handlers from MicroserviceRestService.

Creation

This service must be created by Microservice.onNewGrpcService(). Once created, it is automatically initialized and started by the microservice mini-framework on startup.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
MicroserviceRestService

    • mount

      public void mount​(String path, Class<? extends MicroservletRequestHandler> requestHandlerType)
      Mounts the given request class on the given path.
      Specified by:
      mount in interface com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.internal.protocols.MicroservletMountTarget
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the given microservlet request handler (requestType). If the path is not absolute (doesn't start with a '/'), it is prefixed with: "/api/[major.version].[minor.version]/", where the version is retrieved from Microservice.version(). For example, the path "users" in microservlet version 3.1 will resolve to "/api/3.1/users", and the path "/users" will resolve to "/users".
      requestHandlerType - The type of the request handler
